description: Did you ever wish you could send your friend a message, without them knowing who its from? Then this app is for you! This app lets you send a text message to anyone who uses Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, US Cellular, Virgin Mobile, Cingular, Alltell, Nextel, Boost Mobile, US Cellular, Rogers, Telus, and Qwest. Get it now, at its low introductory price! Update: Extends Phone Text Box to 15 Character Maximum, 5 more carriers! If you need support, feel free to email or text me, i cannot respond to comments!
versionNote: More Carriers, Support for phone numbers up to 15 characters.
